titleStmt.title: J. Critt Furnish et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG9826

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p: The undersigned petitioners would respectfully represent. that at the march term of the Gallatin Circuit Court William Winn & Josiah Flack citizens of sd County was Each fined $60 for Keeping a tipling house in said county we think the indictment was procured through prejudice the proof showing but a single offence of Spirits having been drunk by parties on premises ajacent to the premises where sold and that without the Knowledge or consent of the parties Winn & Flack they being at the time partners we Know the men & they are not law brakeing but law abiding men and good Citizens we therefore Respictfully petition your honor to remit Said fines

J Critt Furnish
Thos Story
John. T. Robinson Jr
E. C. Peak
C. H. White
David Story Foreman of Jury
C. W. Farris
W. H. Keene
E W Scarborough
W. H. Kirby
W. A. Baily
T J Turpin
Robt Payne
J W Bacon
J M, Blackman
R L. Ireland
W. F. Hilton
Wm Redman
Philip Edmondson
D, P, Ginn
C C Murdock
A. Shatle
B. F. Logan
Henry hase
Garland Turyman
L, W, Baldwin
D, L, Harrison
James Bruce
A Simpson
R Simpson
Jn McDanell
W. S. Allen
Z. McWilliams
J,, H,, McDanell
D, B, Dailey
John E Oliver
C,, Allen
J W Kirby D S S C
H J Abbitt (but know nothing of the facts)
Jonas Jones
J Wilcher
Belt Brashear
Oliver Carver
George Ross
E. T. Owens
Roderick Perry,
John Kirby
A, Ritchey
Joseph Coons
Wm Brett
Robt Russell, Post Master
Thomas. Vacre
James. Redman
Thomas Hase
Fountain Perry
Jas S,, McHatten
L Gwinn
I also ask that the fine may be remitted
